DOC.brief_title: Multi-Tracer PET Quantitation Insulin Action Muscle ( Phase 1 , Phase 2 , Phase 3 , Phase 4 )
DOC.detailed_description: The goal proposal develop novel triple-tracer positron emission tomography ( PET ) method image vivo insulin-stimulated tissue perfusion , glucose transport glucose phosphorylation skeletal muscle healthy individual . The long term goal later apply model study metabolic disease , notably type 2 diabetes mellitus ( Type 2 DM ) obesity ( Ob ) . While often suggest glucose transport rate-controlling step insulin action , test hypothesis control insulin exerts uptake glucose skeletal muscle distribute across flow tissue perfusion , trans-membrane transport intra-cellular phosphorylation glucose . Specific Aim 1 . The first specific aim develop triple-tracer PET method quantitative determination tissue perfusion , glucose transport glucose phosphorylation skeletal muscle . To measure blood flow tissue perfusion , use 15O-H2O ( half-life ~ 2 min ; also refer 15O-water ) . To measure glucose transport , use 11C-3-O-methyl glucose ( half-life ~ 20 min ; also refer 3-0-MG ) , analog transport phosphorylated otherwise metabolize . 18F-2-deoxy-2-fluoro-glucose ( half-life ~ 109 min ; also refer FDG ) , use examine glucose transport glucose phosphorylation . Because difference half-life three positron ( 15O , 11C , 18F ) , feasible use tracer , sequence , individual . Specific Aim 2 . The second specific aim rigorously test mathematical model extract quantitative physiological information dynamic PET imaging . We test novel model specifically address kinetics substrate delivery within interstitial space skeletal muscle ( i.e . 5 rate constant , 4 compartment model respect FDG . Model test entail use non-compartmental model e.g . spectral analysis ) .
DOC.criteria: We recruit normal weight ( BMI 19 25 kg/m2 ) , glucose tolerant , healthy volunteer , age 20 45 year old . Volunteers study must fast glucose < 100 mg/dl ; HbA1c < 6.0 ; Hct > 34 ; ALT < 60 ; AST < 60 ; Alk phos < 150 ; TSH < 8 ; Trig < 300 ; Chol < 250 ; systolic BP < 150 ; diastolic BP < 95 ; negative family history ( firstdegree relative ) type 2 DM ; good health take chronic medication . Previous difficulty xylocaine exclusion . To eligible study , volunteer must free clinical evidence cardiac , renal , hepatic , vascular disease , major medical problem would endanger volunteer compromise scientific validity study . Subjects history myocardial infarction , proteinuria ( defined 1+ protein ) , liver disease , alcohol drug abuse , malignancy neuromuscular disease exclude . Subjects exclude take chronic medication know adversely affect glucose homeostasis include thiazide diuretic , oral glucocorticoid , nicotinic acid , betablockers . Subjects gain lost 3 kg past 6 month exclude . Because PET scanning , premenopausal woman must negative pregnancy test within 24 hour prior procedure confirm prior PET scan session . These subject also advise use reliable contraceptive technique study period . To avoid radiation exposure infant , woman currently breastfeed permit participate research study . Subjects participate Phase 2 Phase 4 ( include MRI Scan ) exclude contraindication MRI surgical vascular implant , pregnancy , pacemaker , claustrophobia . In subject questionable history metallic fragment , Xray suspect area body perform rule .
